Testimonials.text: "Amazing stay at casa Carmela . It is so spacious and so clean . Itâ€™s bright and beautiful. The balcony is breath taking . They communicated daily with help immediately and suggestions . When I return I will only stay here . The house is well equipped with snacks and frozen cafe .. delicious !! Positano is a lot of steep walking keep that in mind .. I love this home because you can catch the bus right outside .. it is perfection and the family is so nice !! I miss it already"
Testimonials.name: Gina

Testimonials.text: "The home was in beautiful location and was so beautiful and clean. They provide so many extra ammenties and special touches to make your stay memorable and wonderful. They are very kind and helpful with setting up experiences. Our family of six enjoyed our stay and will visit again."
Testimonials.name: Joseph
